abstrac: Digital Marketing Strategist | Email & Content Marketing
bio:
I'm an individual freelancer and I'm here to help entrepreneurs, businessmen & startups to increase their sales/leads and business worldwide.

I am an SEO/SEM/SMM professional having 5 years of experience. I have been ranking my clients and my own websites on top of Google, week after week and month after month, I have passed all the panda, penguin, pigeon, hummingbird updates without a scratch.

Why HIRE ME?

My service is 100% guaranteed and ensures transparency. All my points will be bulleted for easy understanding,

1) Expertise in keyword research and competition analysis via various tools
2) In-Depth understanding of SEO Ranking factors
3) Healthy Experience with Google Penguin Ban Filters and Recovery
4) Acquire quality search engine friendly backlinks
5) Strong technical experience with On-Site Optimization and Website SEO issues
6) HTML, PHP, ASP.NET, WordPress, Joomla, and other major eCommerce portal working experience
7) Extensive experience with website usability and bounce rate reduction
8) In-depth knowledge about Google Penguin, Panda & Hummingbird Algorithms
9) Handful experience with Analytics, Goals, Funnels, Tracking, and custom reports

Every week, my clients are given a weekly report to chart the progress they’ve made so far and projections for where they'll rank in coming months. I show you samples of the links we build so you know exactly what you’re paying for. Best of all, your links will always be in place. Even after you’ve paid, your return on investment continues to grow.

I am willing to invest in you upfront to prove what I am capable of. My SEO methods are so reputable that you will be able to see ranking improvements within the first two weeks. I create backlinks on a daily basis using organic content and adhering to industry standards of SEO. I monitor changes in Google’s algorithms every day, allowing me to excel at what I do.
As Needed - Open to Offers

bio:
I have around 15 years of experience in developing windows and web based applications. I have created CRMs, managed one of the biggest law site in India, secured servers and applications, managed offshore clients, provided consultancy to my clients and have failed only twice - both the time because the technology did not exist at the time.

I started as a developer, moved on to become team leader, solution architect, project manager and finally back to the thing that I loved most - developing applications. So in me not only you get a developer but also a seasoned project manager who can visualize what your requirements are and can suggest different options.
I am normally online in morning EST time zone and full day for UK time zone. I rather prefer fixed price projects and am available over Skype for quick communication.

abstrac: Creativity and Versatility for your product. Knowledge and Experience for your Company.
bio:
My name is Javi. I am from León, Spain. I studied Industrial Engineering and Mechanical Engineering and I have Master's Degrees on INdustrial Engineering and Product Design. For the last 7 years I have been working as a product and project manager while I have been creating content on my own time. Now I am working as a freelancer, creating models, writing content and stories, editting video and also teching languages and engineering. 

I speak four languages: Spanish, English, French and German. I have excellent skills in a variety of software for modelling and editing (Adobe creative package, 3Dsmax, CATIA...) and very good people and organizational skills,  but above all, what I always try to bring to my work is effort, integrity and partnership. With those values in mind, and a desire to learn, any goal can be achieved.

Beyond that, I am a fairly regular person with quite a lot of interests: I enjoy nature, sport, cinema, a beer with friends, and enjoying the good company of my dogs.
I addapt to your needs.

abstrac: Communicating Ideas through Story Telling And Designs.
bio:
Having worked in freelance and agency environments for more than five years, I am passionate about helping businesses convey their messages through design. It is my goal to deliver quality and original work every time.

I've been working in the video editing and animation industry for the past five years, working with clients from all over the world and tackling a variety of projects, including education, entertainment, graphic animation, social media content creation, advertising, YouTube content creation, and 2D/3D animation.

Work schedule:
I mostly work throughout the week, if I take off that's usually the weekend.

You can reach me via Skype, email, or phone.

Payment Terms:
Negotiable.
